hackathon-description-text: Learn something new and build something cool this weekend. We have tons of food and swag for hackers and some amazing talks from our sponsors. Check out our hackathon page
hackathon-rules: We follow MHL's code of conduct. You agreed to it when you signed up! You can view it

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Plain and simple, the most interesting project at the hackathon. Sponsored by GTS
Each winning team will take home a Google Home Mini! Chosen by our awesome Vanguard sponsors!
This submission is open source with humanitarian ideals in mind. Each team member gets 400 hackbu points to spend on Amazon or another online retailer
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Open Source and Humanitarian Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This hack could reasonably be continued and built into a business. It solves a real problem. Each team member gets 400 HackBU points to spend on Amazon or another online retailer.

Each team member gets 400 HackBU points to spend on Amazon or another online retailer.
Each member gets 300 HackBU points to spend but there is a catch. Members can get their prize hilariously shipped to anyone in the US anonymously.
